verses.verse: The message<WH1697> that Jeremiah<WH3414> the prophet<WH5030> spoke<WH1696> to Baruch<WH1263> the son<WH1121> of Neriah,<WH5374> when he wrote<WH3789> these words<WH1697> in a book<WH5612> at the mouth<WH6310> of Jeremiah,<WH3414> in the fourth<WH7243> year<WH8141> of Jehoiakim<WH3079> the son<WH1121> of Josiah,<WH2977> king<WH4428> of Judah,<WH3063> saying,<WH559>
Thus says<WH559> Yahweh,<WH3068> the God<WH430> of Israel,<WH3478> to you,<WH1263> Baruch:
You said,<WH559> Woe<WH188> is me now!<WH3068> for Yahweh has added<WH3254> sorrow<WH3015> to my pain;<WH4341> I am weary<WH3021> with my groaning,<WH585> and I find<WH4672> no rest.<WH4496>

You shall tell<WH559> him,<WH559> Thus says Yahweh:<WH3068> Behold,<WH1129> that which I have built will I break down,<WH2040> and that which I have planted<WH5193> I will pluck up;<WH5428> and this in the whole land.<WH776>

Do you seek<WH1245> great things<WH1419> for yourself?<WH1245> Don't seek them;<WH935> for, behold, I will bring evil<WH7451> on all flesh,<WH1320> says<WH5002> Yahweh;<WH3068> but your life<WH5315> will I give<WH5414> to you for a prey<WH7998> in all places<WH4725> where you go.<WH3212>
